name: Dimension Switch (Elisa Urbanski)
description:
This is a simple platformer game made for the Trijam #141.

Controls:

WAD to move player 1

Arrow Keys to move player 2

S, Arrow Down or Space to Switch the Dimension

Premade Assets I used:

Kenney Mini Square Font

Bugs I couldn't fix in time:

if you press LEFT, UP and Space the dimension won't change

if you press three keys from the same set, the dimension also won't change
